room_title: Escape room "The Golden-Bug" by Smart Escape in Washington, D.C.
room_description:
Join William Legrand in his adventure of searching for treasure buried by the legendary pirate, Captain Kidd. Can you solve all the riddles, and uncover the secret location of Kidds treasure? The clock is ticking, you have 60 minutes.

The basis of this detective story was based on the story of William Legrand in the Gold Bug, written by Edgar Allan Poe
